response.summary:
I love to create and love to solve problems. When I do something, I like to do it well and not by halves. I am a creative engineer with great initiative and great taste for learning.

I am passionate about thinking and knowing how things work in depth. I am motivated by challenges and learning. Faced with a difficult problem, with persistence, method, and creativity, I know that I can come up with a solution, I think this is the most rewarding thing in engineering.

I have work experience as a software developer and advanced Python skills. I have interests and knowledge in robotics, automation, mechatronics design, data science, software development, embedded systems, and any combination of the above. Still, I am adaptable and like to learn and combine engineering with other disciplines.

My professional purpose at the moment is to find projects and people that satisfy my curiosity and allow me to learn and improve continuously. In the near future, I am looking for a master's degree that will allow me to combine and deepen my knowledge in robotics, mechatronics design, embedded systems, and machine learning.

I am currently available for new work projects, please do not hesitate to contact me.
response.skills: Automatización industrial, Programación, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Ingeniería, Automatización, Diseño de sistemas de control, Visión por computador, Robótica, Python, Java, C++, Programación en C, Autodesk Inventor, Autodesk Fusion 360, LaTeX, Matlab, Simulink, Microcontroladores, Arduino, Sistemas embebidos

company.name: SLB
company.description: We are a technology company that unlocks access to energy for the benefit of all. As innovators, that’s been our mission for nearly a century. Today, we face a global imperative to create a future with more energy, but less carbon. Our diverse, innovative change makers are focused on going further in innovation and inventing the new energy technologies we need to get there.
